JUDGES: Antonella Mularoni;Françoise Tulkens;Ireneu Cabral Barreto;Nona Tsotsoria
TEXT: The applicants , whose names and dates of birth appear in the appendix , are all NORP nationals . They are represented before the ORG by PERSON K. ORG , a lawyer practising in GPE .
The applicants were shareholders of a plot of land located in GPE , GPE .
On an unspecified date GPE ( hereinafter “ GPE ) expropriated the applicants’ plot of land and paid them the sum of MONEY ( TRL ) in compensation for expropriation .
On DATE the applicants initiated proceedings against the Municipality before ORG seeking additional compensation .
On DATE the first - instance court awarded the applicants additional compensation of ORG plus interest at the statutory rate accruing from DATE .
On DATE the applicants commenced enforcement proceedings against the Municipality .

On DATE , on an appeal by the Municipality , ORG quashed the judgment in part in respect of some of the applicants due to procedural irregularities and remitted the case to the first - instance court .
On DATE ORG remedied the procedural irregularities indicated by ORG and awarded additional compensation to the applicants on the same terms as determined in its previous judgment .
On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of the first - instance court .

DATE GPE made certain payments to the applicants in several instalments in the total sum of GPE CARDINAL . On DATE ORG declared that the applicants had an outstanding claim of GPE CARDINAL,CARDINAL,CARDINAL,CARDINAL as of that date .

On DATE the applicants signed an agreement with the GPE whereby the latter agreed to make the outstanding payments by DATE with the proviso that the applicants renounce PERCENT of their claims and discontinue all enforcement proceedings .
The outstanding payments for additional compensation were made in DATE and DATE by the GPE .
